Articles.Content:
Rules:

1. Follow all [Forum Rules](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/30064-Community-Rules-July-24-2014). (Duh).
2. Stick to the game, don't start conversations, etc.
3. Make the word a real word rather than a made up word, i.e CAR instead of IMSOCOOL.
4. Please make the completed acronyms sound like a thing, rather than just a sentence, i.e Ceres Activity Recon instead of Cats Attack Rats.

Gameplay works like this:

1. First poster (me) posts a word.
2. Second poster has to come up with a somewhat reasonable acronym that has the letters of the word and posts a new word.
3. Repeat step 2 indefinitely.

Example:

> 
> word

> 
> (W)hacky (O)bstructionist ®andom (D)ichotomy. GHOST

sorry for the bad analogy, just a place holder, will be replaced with actual game quotes eventually.

First word: SORRY
